text: Shahriar Municipality and Suburbs Bus Organization () is a public transport agency running Transit buses in Shahriar City and surrounding cities in Shahriar County in Tehran Province. The transit agency has one major bus terminal called Shahriar 22 Bahman Bus Terminal. ==List of Routes== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ |colspan="7" | 680px |- |-bgcolor=#ACE1AF !Colour !Name !Length (km) !Connections |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#3F48CC" | |Shahriar-Azari |28.5 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#ED1C24" | |Shariar-Azadi |28 |x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#22B14C" | | Shahriar-Karaj |18 |x20pxx20pxx15px Karaj Metro Station Shahid Soltani Bus Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#A349A4" | |Shahriar-Andisheh |7 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#00A2E8" | |Shahriar-Safadasht |22 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#008080" | |Shahriar-Amirieh |6 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#FFAEC9" | |Shahriar-Vahidieh |8 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#B5E61D" | |Shahriar-Ferdowsieh |8 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#FF0080" | |Shahriar-Shahedshahr |12 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#B97A57" | |Shahriar-Sabashahr |12 | |} == References== Category:Transport in Iran Category:Bus transport in Iran
